org.dspace.browse

Class ItemCountDAOPostgres

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.browse.ItemCountDAOPostgres
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemCountDAO

    public class ItemCountDAOPostgres
extends Object
implements ItemCountDAO
    Postgres driver implementing ItemCountDAO interface to cache item count information in communities and collections
    Author:
    Richard Jones
